attributes.action: Make it law that all public buildings in England fly the  George cross flag.
attributes.additional_details: Because if it is written into law then all public buildings will be required to fly the flag, given the choice literally none do through fear of offending someone. This is not right, we live in England, be proud and show people we are proud.
attributes.background: Make it law, we need to once again to show we are proud to be English.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require all public buildings to display the Union Jack flag
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/726537
